meanings.definition: A close-fitting cap that covers the top of the head
meanings.sent1: She wore a pink skullcap to keep her head warm in the cold weather.
meanings.sent2: The baseball player put on his lucky skullcap before stepping up to bat.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten tried to wear a skullcap, but it was too big for her tiny head.
meanings.sent4: His skullcap was like a cozy hug for his head on chilly mornings.
meanings.sent5: The bright red skullcap stood out in the sea of plain hats.

meanings.definition: The bony structure of the head enclosing the brain
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the skullcap on the X-ray to show the patient where the injury was.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist carefully examined the ancient skullcap found at the dig site.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended his skullcap was a treasure chest for his toys.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts felt trapped within her skullcap, unable to escape.
meanings.sent5: The skullcap protected the delicate brain like a sturdy fortress.
